name: It is dangerous to rewind
description:
You are aspiring scientist, and you somehow managed to develop a time machine. Now it is time to test it. This is where your adventure begins. Explore weird domain of time and manage to escape it.

I recommend playing standalone build, because web build has some problems with mouse controls. Also Ending is unplayable in web build, for unknown reason. But it works for the most part.

if web build does not work for you PLEASE try standalone build.

Make sure to go to settings menu. You can increase/decrease font size and mouse sensitivity there. Plus for web build you can enable toggling mouse input

Submission to Brakeys Game Jam 2020.2

Controls:

  • WASD or arrows - Movement
  • Mouse - camera
  • Left mouse - toggle camera (Optional setting)
  • E - Interact
  • ESC or Tab or ` - Pause
